text: “Lowo modongʼ kolworo bath lowo maler mopwodhi koni gi koni kaachiel gi lowo mowe ni dala maduongʼ nobed mar ruoth. Lowo maler mopwodhi koa yo wuok chiengʼ nyaka podho chiengʼ nobedi kilomita apar gariyo gi nus maromre koni gi koni. Lope ariyogi duto borgi nobed maromre gi lope mopogne dhoot ka dhoot kendo ginibed mag ruoth. Lowo maler mopwodhi kaachiel gi kama ler mar lemo mar hekalu nobed e diergi tir.
